input.sentences: i vacationed on the beach in location last summer .
the sand was covered in snow .
i stayed in this tiny cabin on the beach .
every morning i 'd go for a walk along the water .
my favorite location to walk to was this giant dead tree .
output.sentences: Some people love to take summer vacations at he seashore and sometimes they go in winter.
Walking along the shore in fresh snow is far more interesting than walking on sand.
A friend of mine went last year and rented a tiny cabin where he embraced the solitude.
He'd walk along for hours without encountering another soul.
One evening he walked so far he found himself in a tree lined area on the edge of town.
